title: Champion animation freeze and teleports
body:
Ever since the new update, champions with targetted dash such as Thresh and Lee looks like they're teleporting to me. There's no animation in between to show that they're moving you just see where they are and then they're next to you. I run a constant 100+ fps so its not a frame lag there's simply just no animation in between those for some reason  ? Also snowball dashing backwards

i5-3330
RX560 OC 2GB
8GB DDr3
Win 7
